original: Ejeman, Per David, stadsfogde, Linköping, f. 16/2/98 i Linköp. G. 31 m. Dagmar Lundberg. Barn: Göran f. 33, Kerstin 39. — Stud:ex. i Linköp. 16, kansliex. i Upps. 20. Not. å Linköp. stads kansli 20-24, tf. stadsfogde i Linköp. 24, ord. dito sed. 27. Ordf. i tax:nd 30-43, ordf. i Linköp. bef :-utb:fören., led. av styr. f. Linköp. fo bef :utb :förb. o. Linköp. ork:fören., sekr. i kyrkoråd o. kyrkofullm. sed. 25. Hobby: musik. CBF förtj :SM.
translated: Ejeman, Per David, town bailiff, Linköping, born on February 16th, 1898 in Linköping. Married in 1931 to Dagmar Lundberg. Children: Göran (born in 1933) and Kerstin (born in 1939). He graduated from high school in Linköping in 1916 and then passed his administrative exams in Uppsala in 1920. He worked as a clerk at the Linköping city office from 1920 to 1924, then as deputy town bailiff in Linköping in 1924, and finally as town bailiff from 1927. He was chairman of the tax authority from 1930 to 1943, chairman of the Linköping Construction Association, a member of the board of directors for the Linköping Education Association and the Linköping Sports Association, and secretary for the church council and church commissioners since 1925. His hobby was music and he earned the Swedish Order of Merit.

jobTitle.name: Member of Board of Directors for Linköping Education Association
Member of Board of Directors for Linköping Sports Association
Secretary for Church Council and Church Commissioners
